text:
ACT SAT Prep Learn how to determine the savings between two plans

[imath] \mathcal{U} [/imath]\n() Four friends are about to pay [imath] \$ 20 [/imath] each to enter in a music park. When they discover that groups of 5 can pay special entrance fee for [imath] \$ 85 . [/imath] How much would each of the friends save if they convince a fifth person to join them and five people divided the equally the price of the special group entrance fee?
